text:
Luis Alberto Lacalle de Herrera, GCMG, (, known as Cuqui (born July 13, 1941) is a Uruguayan lawyer and politician. He served as President of Uruguay from 1990 to 1995.
In August 1978 Lacalle was sent three bottles of wine tainted with poison The case remains unsolved.
His son is Luis Alberto Lacalle Pou, the 42nd President.
